name: Squarator - The Platformer (Mobile)
description:
Note: The version numbers of this  will not be the same as the PC, Mac, and Linux edition, and versions will not have the exact same updates.

Welcome to this platformer! This platformer is a 5 level platformer with a square. You can drag the square around. The square acts as an elevator so getting collided with it will make you go up with it (keep in mind the elevator might move faster than you depending how far you move it).

Current Bugs:

Bullet's show from the very beginning.

Some sound effects will glitch.

(these bugs are currently being worked on)
